sys_script.name: vehicle tracker status

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_cd988c442f0231100e05235df699b68e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_919130_loaner_0_vehicle_tracker</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_919130_loaner_0_vehicle_tracker">vehicle_statusVALCHANGES^EQ<item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="vehicle_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>vehicle tracker status</name><order>400</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var vts = current.vehicle_status; // Get the 'vehicle_status' value from the current record on the tracker table

var gr = new GlideRecord('x_919130_loaner_0_loaner_vehicle_catalog'); // Create a GlideRecord object for the ()'x_919130_loaner_0_loaner_vehicle_catalog') table.

gr.addQuery('sys_id', current.vehicle); // Add a query condition to find records where 'sys_id' matches the 'vehicle" field in the current record on the tracker table.

gr.query(); // Execute the query.

// Iterate through status on the tracker table. If true, change the status on the loaner table.
if (gr.next()) {
if (vts == 'pending release' || vts == 'out on field' || vts== 'returned for inspection' || vts== 'sent for servicing') {
	gr.status= 'unavailable';
} else if (vts== 'returned to warehouse') {
	gr.status= 'available';
} else if (vts== ' decomissioned') {
	gr.status= 'decomissioned';
}
gr.update(); // Update the 'status' field in the loaner table with the new status value.
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-17 19:34:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cd988c442f0231100e05235df699b68e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>vehicle tracker status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory." source="x_919130_loaner_0">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory.">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cd988c442f0231100e05235df699b68e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 22:02:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cd988c442f0231100e05235df699b68e"/></record_update>
